definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: A growing need for data protection.
sentences.chinese: 数据保户需求越来越强。

sentences.english: Was the Driver driving with the Insured's knowledge and consent ?
sentences.chinese: 该驾驶人是否得保户之许可驾驶肇事之車辆？

sentences.english: Copy of HKID Card of the Insured.
sentences.chinese: 保户的香港身份证副本。

sentences.english: Instead, policyholders share in the ownership of the company.
sentences.chinese: 相反，所有的保户都是我们公司的所有人。

sentences.english: The families receiving allowances will have qualifications checked once or twice a year.
sentences.chinese: 每年应对低保户资格进行一到两次核查。

sentences.english: Or what about American Insurance Companies that regularly use terrorist tactics to coerce it's policy holders.
sentences.chinese: 再说美国保险公司经常使用恐怖手段，迫使它的保户。

sentences.english: The purchasing behavior of unit linked insurance follows the general model of purchasing behavior.
sentences.chinese: 保户购买投资型保险之行为遵循消费者行为模型。

sentences.english: They have very little interaction with other recipients, perhaps because they are ashamed," Solinger said.
sentences.chinese: 他们和其他低保户接触非常少，也许因为感觉没面子。
